isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - TWO SPEED AXLE SPEEDOMETER CIRCUIT - TWO SPEED ELECTRIC AXLE (AIR) AND AIR DRYER W/AUTOMATIC OR MANUAL TRANSMISSION CIRCUIT DIAGRAM
